gov.nasa.arc.mct.gui
Interface SelectionProvider

public interface SelectionProvider

This specifies the interface for widgets that contribute to the selection model. This is a widget which can change the set of selected components within one of the recognized selection areas (content area, context area, or directory area). A SelectionProvider determines the selected component within this selection scope and broadcasts events based on the selected set of manifestations. Implementations must ensure that only selection change events are published to the registered change listeners.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String SELECTION_CHANGED_PROP
          Defines the property name when the set of selected manifestations changes.

SELECTION_CHANGED_PROP

static final java.lang.String SELECTION_CHANGED_PROP
Defines the property name when the set of selected manifestations changes.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

addSelectionChangeListener

void addSelectionChangeListener(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
Adds a listener to receive events when the set of selected manifestations changes. The property name will be SELECTION_CHANGED_PROP.

Parameters:
listener - to receive events when the selection is changed

removeSelectionChangeListener

void removeSelectionChangeListener(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
Removes listener.

Parameters:
listener - to remove.

getSelectedManifestations

java.util.Collection<View> getSelectedManifestations()
Returns the selected manifestations.

Returns:
currently selected manifestations, the result may be empty but not null

clearCurrentSelections

void clearCurrentSelections()
Clears the set of current selections such that calling getSelectedManifestations() will return an empty collection getSelectedManifestations().isEmpty() == true. Selection events must not be fired during the invocation of this method.
